inclusion.criterion: Patient must be treated with ribavirin.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must be treated with one or more DAAs (simeprevir, sofosbuvir, daclatasvir, ledipasvir, paritaprevir, ombitasvir, or dasabuvir).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 18 years of age at start of treatment.
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN, RBV, and DAAs. He meets all inclusion criteria.
